share on x bm betty and kevin munn. jun 11 at 6:02 pm betty and kevin munn purchased the blooming garden basket for the family of roger w. munn. share on x bm betty munn. jun 11 at 5:28 pm roger was a loving man. before his illness he was a hard worker who also enjoyed meeting his buddies for coffee and *just visiting and talking^. his nephew remembers lovingly how he joked and picked at him. he is reunited with his brother and nephew as well as his parents and in-laws; what a joyful reunion: his gain and our loss. 'til we meet again.... betty munn. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x jb janice b. jun 11 at 11:20 am janice b. purchased the sentimental dreams for the family of roger w. munn. share on x ja jerald adkisson. jun 11 at 9:48 am without a doubt roger was one of the best men i have ever known. his spirit about life was infectious and wherever he was that carried over to everyone. i will always have a special place in my heart for him and will miss him daily. god rest his soul..... comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x more memories... visitation. jun 12. 6:00 pm - 8:00 pm sanders funeral home1420 main street. lubbock, tx, us, 79401. get order flowers now for roger's visitation celebration of life. jun 13. 11:00 am sanders funeral home1420 main street. lubbock, tx, us, 79401. get order flowers now for roger's celebration of life graveside service. jun 15. 10:30 am ridgeview west memorial park. frisco, tx, usget order flowers now for roger's graveside service wall 365 days of grief support. subscribe facebook sanders funeral home website designed by funeralone contact obituaries about store
